content: These settings will be available once the second space is created and applied to all your spaces.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a message that will be displayed when certain settings are not enabled, typically appearing in a UI component such as a button or a dialog. The message indicates that these settings have not been applied to all spaces yet and will become available once the second space is created.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "These settings will be available once the second space is created and applied to all your spaces" is not accurately reflected in the Finnish translation. "Avautuvat käyttöön" implies a passive opening or release, not the active creation and application described in the English text. 'Asetettu kaikkiin käytössä oleviin tiloihisi' doesn't quite capture the 'applied to all your spaces' meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that more directly conveys the creation and application aspect. For example: 'Nämä asetukset tulevat saataville, kun toinen tila on luotu ja käytetty kaikkiin tiloihisi.' (These settings will be available when the second space is created and used in all your spaces.) or 'Nämä asetukset tulevat käyttöön, kun olet luonut toisen tilan ja soveltanut sen kaikkiin tiloihisi.' (These settings will be available when you's created a second space and applied it to all your spaces.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation uses the masculine plural 'appliqués' which doesn't agree with 'paramètres' which is masculine singular. It should be 'appliqué(e)s' to agree with the context (settings) or be rephrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ces paramètres seront disponibles une fois le deuxième espace créé et appliqués à tous vos espaces.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'applied to all your spaces' could be more accurately translated to reflect the automatic application. While '모든 공간에 적용됩니다' is technically correct, it might imply a manual action. A more natural phrasing could highlight the automatic application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이러한 설정은 두 번째 공간이 생성되면 사용할 수 있으며 모든 공간에 자동으로 적용됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'applied to all your spaces' is not accurately reflected by 'ຈະຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ກັບເຂດແຖວທັງຫມົດຂອງທ່ານ'. A more accurate translation might emphasize the setting being *implemented* or *active* in all spaces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຄ່າຕັ້ງເຫລົ່ານີ້ຈະມີໃຫ້ເມື່ອສ້າງເຂດແຖວທີສອງ ແລະ ຈະຖືກນໍາໃຊ້/ເຜີຍແຜ່/ເຮັດໃຫ້ມີຜົນຮັກຜົນໃນເຂດແຖວທັງຫມົດຂອງທ່ານ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "applied to all your spaces" is not accurately translated. 'යෙදූ පසු' (yedu passu) implies a one-time application, while the English implies ongoing availability. A better translation would convey ongoing application or existence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: දෙවන ඉඩ නිර්මාණය කර එය සියලු අවකාශයන් වෙත යෙදී, පවතී නම් මෙම සිටුවම් ලබා ගත හැක.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'සිටුවම්' (sithuwam) might be a typo. It's unclear if this is the intended word for 'settings'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: settings සඳහා වඩාත් සුදුසු පදය භාවිතා කරන්න. (Use a more appropriate word for 'settings')

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'applied to all your spaces' doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'available once the second space is created and applied to all your spaces'. A more accurate translation would imply that the settings are pushed to all spaces after the second space is created.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Te nastavitve bodo na voljo, ko bo ustvarjen drugi prostor in bodo samodejno uporabljene za vse vaše prostore.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'applied to all your spaces' is not accurately reflected. 'Примењиваће се на све ваше просторе' implies a more forceful or mandatory application, while the English implies availability. A more accurate translation would convey availability rather than forced application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ова подешавања ће бити доступна када се креира други простор и биће доступна за све ваше просторе.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'applied' is not accurately translated. 'Primenjivaće se' implies a future action of being applied, but the English conveys it's a state of being available. A better translation would convey 'become available'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ova podešavanja će biti dostupna kada se kreira drugi prostor i biće važeća za sve vaše prostore.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'applied to all your spaces' is a bit literal and could be improved for a more natural Ukrainian flow. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ці параметри стануть доступними після створення другого простору та будуть застосовані до всіх ваших просторів.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "created and applied" doesn't flow naturally in Vietnamese in this context. A more natural phrasing would be something along the lines of 'được tạo và kích hoạt' or 'được tạo và áp dụng'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Những cài đặt này sẽ khả dụng sau khi không gian thứ hai được tạo và kích hoạt cho tất cả các không gian của bạn.
